column2: an A.M. Eatery////If you don't mind the wait
column3: or get lucky and come when there isn't one
column4: then the food is very good. However I can't say the food is good enough to negate the wait
column5: so it ends up with 3 stars from me. I would definitely come back again if I could get in
column6: but I would not put up with sitting around for an hour or more just to eat here.
